## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                         | Type     | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | --------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `buttonText` | `button-text` | The text rendered on the button below the pie chart | `string` | `'Reset'`   |
| `data`       | --            | The data to feed into the d3 pie chart              | `object` | `undefined` |
| `titleText`  | `title-text`  | The title text to render above the pie chart        | `string` | `'Title'`   |
